page.title: 19THE GOSPORT LINES
page.content: We wrote to the Borough Council and when the Mayor visited our school in March she promised to look into the matter. We hope that we can be involved in any 'clean_up campaign' and that we can encourage others to visit this unusual part of Gosport's history. {++++ Then and Now ++++} Then they were Brave, Now they stand with no Grave. Then they were Clean, Now they stand Green. Then they were Bold, Now they stand Cold. Then they made Fear, Now they stand Clear. {Dominic Wallace An extract taken from his poem written after a visit.
